infos.value: One-handed sword; can be equipped to Lords, Warriors, Knights, Paladins, Spellblades, Red Mages, and the Winged One
Greatsword; can be equipped to Soldiers
Katana; can be equipped to Samurai

Gun; can be equipped to Gunners
Staff; can be equipped to White Mages, Black Mages, Green Mages, Time Mages, and Sorceresses

Armor; can be equipped to Lords, Warriors, Knights, Paladins, Soldiers, Samurai, Lancers, Dragoons, Spellblades, and the Winged One

Hat; can be equipped to Lords, Warriors, Monks, Lancers, Thieves, Rangers, Ninjas, Gunners, White Mages, Black Mages, Clerics, Red Mages, Time Mages, Green Mages, White Mages of Lapis, Sorceresses, and Gunbreakers

Clothing; can be equipped to Lords, Warriors, Monks, Lancers, Thieves, Rangers, Ninjas, Gunners, White Mages, Black Mages, Clerics, Red Mages, Time Mages, Green Mages, White Mages of Lapis, Vikings, Sorceresses, and Gunbreakers

Accessory; can be equipped to all Job types
Axe; can be equipped to Vikings

A ticket that allows you to select one Job and summon four Memories (Yellow) to use for enhancing that Job. *Job Memories for the following collaboration units' Jobs are not available: Gunbreaker and Sorceress.
